name: Cut'Em All
description:
You have to deactivate this mine, but for that you'll need to cut all the wires, and always target the top one.

  • Left click to cut a wire
  • Right click to breathe and keep it together

The game has been made in 4hours and 15 minutes for the Trijam 81. The theme was "mining".

Game by Géraud Zucchini, musics by the amazing Antoine Druaux.
